page.title: 13GHOST STORIES
page.content: There are many stories about super_ natural occurrences in this area.Some of these tales were told to us by local shopkeepers who live in the historic buildings of Lenham Square. {The butcher's story} was perhaps the most credible, since it has had such recent manifestations. Last year he had the roof retiled and, whilst one of the workmen was working alone in the attic, he heard strange groans and cries coming from one corner. The man was frightened and went to fetch his workmate.He too heard the moans. They continued until the roof was replaced. George, the butcher, says that the noises may have some possible connection with a butcher who shot himself with a humane (not human) killer. {The Quaker's Ghost }was seen by the lady hairdresser who has her salon
